title: IU's Crean knocked down by Michigan player ... and another double foul

text: IU's Crean knocked down by Michigan player ... and another double foul Scott Horner , scott.horner@indystar.com Published 2:02 p.m. ET Feb. 12, 2017 | Updated 20 minutes ago Facebook A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Buy Photo Freddie McSwain Jr. of Indiana fouls Zak Irvin of Michigan, during first half action at Indiana men's basketball, Assembly Hall, Bloomington, Sunday, February 12, 2017. Robert Scheer/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo Robert Johnson of Indiana passes around Muhammad-Ali Abdur-Rahkman, of Michigan at Indiana men's basketball, Assembly Hall, Bloomington, Sunday, February 12, 2017. Robert Scheer/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo John Harbaugh, behind the Indiana bench, Michigan at Indiana men's basketball, Assembly Hall, Bloomington, Sunday, February 12, 2017. Robert Scheer/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo Thomas Bryant of Indiana, is defended in the low post during first half action against Michigan at Indiana men's basketball, Assembly Hall, Bloomington, Sunday, February 12, 2017. Robert Scheer/IndyStar Fullscreen Buy Photo Tom Crean, Head Coach of Indiana, Michigan at Indiana men's basketball, Assembly Hall, Bloomington, Sunday, February 12, 2017.
